channel.description: Week 12 Announcements Coming Up Mon: Lab 6 Due 7 PM 12/3: Final Project Proposal 12/6: Lab 7 Monday 7 PM Lab 6 Grading Windows File Server Ubuntu File Server Windows Web Application Cloud Web Application Lab 7 Backup & Restore Monitoring DevOps Final Project Build Something or Fix Something Web Resource for New Startup Set up Laptops for a School Design Central Auth for Company Thin Clients vs. Thick in Labs Chat with me for ideas Final Project Completion Written Report - Use Template Research, Propose & SWOT Analysis Include Graphics & Data As Needed Live Presentation - 15-30 minutes Convince Me You've Analyzed It Well Small Prototype - Should be Easy Spend 2-4 Hours on Prototype Presentation Live or Pre-recorded Present on or before Friday Schedule Now! Email for Alt. Arrangements Keep in Touch! Discussions on Discord https://discordbot.cs.ksu.edu "Tea Time" Office Hours Tuesday 3:30 | Friday 10:30 One-on-One Office Hours
